tool_description: Natural language API to extract nutrition data from any text. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/nutrition.
title: Nutrition by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/nutrition

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query text to extract nutrition information (e.g. **bacon and 3 eggs**).

utterances.utterance: Can you tell me the nutritional content of a sandwich with turkey, lettuce, and tomato?

parameters.query: sandwich with turkey, lettuce, and tomato

utterances.utterance: I need the nutrition facts for a smoothie made with banana, spinach, and almond milk.

parameters.query: smoothie made with banana, spinach, and almond milk

utterances.utterance: What are the calories and nutrients in a bowl of oatmeal topped with blueberries and honey?

parameters.query: bowl of oatmeal topped with blueberries and honey

utterances.utterance: Please provide the nutrition details for grilled salmon with asparagus and quinoa.

parameters.query: grilled salmon with asparagus and quinoa

utterances.utterance: How much protein and fat are in a breakfast of two scrambled eggs and a slice of whole wheat toast?

parameters.query: two scrambled eggs and a slice of whole wheat toast

utterances.utterance: Give me the nutritional breakdown of a Caesar salad with chicken and croutons.

parameters.query: Caesar salad with chicken and croutons

utterances.utterance: What nutrients are in a serving of spaghetti with marinara sauce and meatballs?

parameters.query: spaghetti with marinara sauce and meatballs

utterances.utterance: I want to know the calories and vitamins in a fruit bowl containing mango, pineapple, and kiwi.

parameters.query: fruit bowl containing mango, pineapple, and kiwi

utterances.utterance: Could you analyze the nutrition of a veggie burger with avocado and sweet potato fries?

parameters.query: veggie burger with avocado and sweet potato fries

utterances.utterance: Tell me the nutritional information for a cup of Greek yogurt with granola and strawberries.

parameters.query: cup of Greek yogurt with granola and strawberries
